complaint.description: I received an sms that my simcard has been inserted into another device. I did not do that, so obviously someone cloned my simcard. I do a lot of internet banking from my phone. I tried calling the customer care number the whole day, but to no avail - only get transferred to a robot, which cannot assist me! I need urgent help please.
complaint.suggestion: Provide better customer service by ensuring that customers can speak to a human representative for urgent matters like this.
